44.eng-name: The Book of the Merits of the Companions
44.ara-name: كتاب فضائل الصحابة رضى الله تعالى عنهم

hadiths.text: Hisham reported on the authority of his father ('Urwa b. Zubair) that A'isha said:BY Allah, both fathers of yours are amongst those who have been men. tioned in this verse:" Those who responded to the call of Allah and the Messenger after the misfortune had fallen upon thein

chapter.ara-name: باب مِنْ فَضَائِلِ طَلْحَةَ وَالزُّبَيْرِ رضى الله عنهما
chapter.eng-name: The Virtues Of Talhah And Az-Zubair (RA)
